title: Chroma Questions
body:
I really want to know what the tought process behind the Chroma packs was... I remember board discussions like 'Riot is so lazy they only release boring skins that have another color' and now this is actually an announced feature?!? 
Are there really players paying money on this?

Also i don't really like the idea of playing versus oddly colored champs... Some of these Chroma 'skins' look REALLY dumb. And compared to Heartseeker Varus or the Pink Taric they are not funny.

replies.body:
Hey lolipop10000, 

One of the biggest goals with chroma packs was to create another option for players when it comes to cosmetic content. Some players simply want a different color for a skin they like (or the base), rather than all of the bells and whistles that something like a legendary skin would come with. 

I've seen quite a few chromas used in game, so I'd say there are definitely players who enjoy the content. 

When we decide on a new chroma pack, we do consider gameplay and clarity, which is why something like black Zac wouldn't be something we'd put into the game.

You have more luck than me then^^

For the time the first chroma hit live, unlike new skin, I still never saw one of them in my game (was thinking yesterday than maybe the whole chroma stuff not linked to mastary was a brake for the player base)

Glad for you you saw some, that prove your work wasn't in vain ^^

Thanks for the answer... also i take back my complaint... i was in a bit of senseless (minor) rage about something that does not really matter. I will live though playing versus pink Zed once in a while ;)

Also i think you guys are really awesome for thinking about stuff like clarity and so on. <insert general riot praise>
No worries at all. Feedback, whether it's positive or negative, is always welcome.

My friend Balliste said she really wants a Celestine Soraka chroma with white hair and that she'd buy that
I don't know where to ask this
Leona is my main and I always use her Pool Party skin. The chroma pack just lets me change her colour up from game to game - I get bored of seeing the same thing all the time .

1) Yes.
2) I have seen some.

You had 2 questions and a lot of complaints, maybe reword your topic?

I am not a fan of chroma packs either, but if people want to spend their money on them, it is their money.
